name: Kaomoji Picker: Wavebeem
desc: A large repository of adorable/kawaii text-based emoticons.

name: cleanEdge
desc: A tool to scale and rotate pixel art while still retaining clean edges.

name: waifu2x
desc: A tool to upscale artwork that is otherwise pixelated or has too many JPG artifacts.

name: Ezgif.com
desc: A browser tool that allows users to do basic functions similar to art programs out there without actually downloading an art program. Includes resizing, cropping, animating GIFs, etc.

name: Neonaut: Become a Compression Sorcerer
desc: A wonderful tutorial that provides tips on how to optimize images so that they still look nice but don't take 500 years to load.

name: HTML Symbols
desc: A repository of all (or at least most) HTML symbols that exist.

name: Just The Recipe
desc: A website that takes links of any recipe and removes all of the fluff and only leaves the recipe. Useful for when chefs force readers to scroll through 20+ pages just to get to the recipe.
